title.rendered: STEDI PUSH SWITCH TO SUIT D-MAX/COLORADO (2012-2020)

content.rendered:
2012+ Isuzu D-Max, Holden Colorado OEM Replacement Push Switches that replace the blank switches supplied in the cabin from factory for more relevant operational switches that are available in different prints depending on the attached device.

OVERVIEW

Suited to fit Isuzu DMAX & Holden Colorado models (2012+). Available in 4 variants of print to replace blank switches located in the cabin. LED Light Bar, Driving Lights, Rear Lights and STEDI Universal prints available.

OPERATION

Simple On/Off function with dash & power illumination, text lighting up whilst the vehicles dash lights are active and icon when the chosen device is currently active. Red backlit illumination.

OEM FITMENT

Complete OEM fitment with a clean finish to maintain the factory look to the inside of the cabin. Included wire tails and diagram for quick & easy installation.

DETAILS

Please select your desired print from the drop-down box. Excellent OE fit quality without any modification required.

KEY FEATURES

  • LED Back Lighting Back Light is Active when Power is ON
  • Laser Etched print ensure our print will never wear
  • Rated at 3A on 12v Excellent non-genuine OEM matching design

COMPATIBLE VEHICLES

  • Isuzu D-Max & MUX | 2012 to Current
  • Holden Colorado | 2012 – 2016 (does not fit the new Z71 models)

Please ensure our switches are always wired through a fused relay.

Switch backlight colour is as per the selector thumbnails.

SPECIFICATIONS

  • Back Light LED Colour – Refer to swatch
  • Surface Size Dimensions 33mmx22mm
  • Rated 3A @ 12v

 

WHAT’S IN THE BOX

  • Holden / Isuzu OE type Switch
  • Wiring Instructions
  • Green connector with wire tails

excerpt.rendered:
STEDI NEW ISUZU (2012+) D-MAX COLORADO PUSH SWITCHES

Please note: If product is out of stock, wait times for this product can be between approx. 1 – 4 weeks from date of order.
